ISSUE.TITLE: Allow for custom rack/device/module airflow choices
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.4 ### Feature type Data model extension ### Proposed functionality A new airflow option "bottom to rear" ### Use case Devices like this: https://www.epiphan.com/products/pearl-2/tech-specs/ ### Database changes _No response_ ### External dependencies _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes: #18305 make contacts mixin available for plugins (#19029)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #18785: Allow for custom rack/device/module airflow choices
